Discussion Topic

Let's explore a couple of examples of parenting styles. Based on this scenario, try to identify the type of parenting style demonstrated.

Scenario: 4-year-old Maria begins crying when her little brother breaks her favorite toy. She finds her father and shows him the broken toy.

According to their response, what parenting style is each parent demonstrating?

Parent Response 1: Oh, don't be sad. Let's go into the kitchen and I'll get you some ice cream. (Dismissing)

Parent Response 2: Oh, I'm sorry you're sad. It's okay. I love you no matter what. (Lassez-faire)

Sample Feedback

Parent Response 1: This parent demonstrated the dismissing parenting style. Though distracting a child can sometimes be effective, research shows that it is not the best approach for valuing a child's emotions.

Parent Response 2: This parent demonstrated the laissez-faire parenting style. Laissez-faire parents encourage their child's emotional expressions, but they do not teach their child how to understand or manage their emotions.
